C

clearHighScores() - Method in class com.snake.GameModel
Clears high score file on user request from Settings view
com.snake - module com.snake
Module containing all snake classes and resources
com.snake - package com.snake
A program based on snakee-v7-src that has been modified heavily and extended to include more levels, different sprites, a high score system, user settings and has been changed from Swing to JavaFX
congratsLabel - Variable in class com.snake.GameOverController
Congratulates user if they've beaten the game
createFile() - Method in class com.snake.GameModel
Creates a blank high score file, used on first run and by SettingsController to wipe high scores on user request

currentHighScoreLabel - Variable in class com.snake.LevelController
Stores current High Score, zero if new install or user has just cleared the high score file
currentLevel - Variable in class com.snake.GameModel
The level the game is currently on
currentScore - Variable in class com.snake.GameModel
